snippet.title: Trash the Planet - IGF Trailer
snippet.description:
Trash the Planet is a resource management game that twists clicker mechanics to serve narrative rather than manipulate the player.


You play as a group of raccoons who start out collecting trash and end up ruling the planet. Help raccoon society evolve at an alarming rate, marvel as the numbers get bigger, and learn how to control the stock market with absolutely no consequences.


Learn more at https://thisgameishaunted.itch.io/, or follow us on Twitter at twitter.com/thisgamehaunted!
